final_diagnosis: The final diagnosis is cholera caused by the Ogawa serotype of Vibrio cholerae in the El Tor biotype. This was confirmed through a positive stool culture for V. cholerae, which aligns with the clinical presentation characterized by severe dehydration and electrolyte imbalances.
